mapper.insert: insert into pathological_eye( unique_id, unique_id_lv1, unique_id_lv2, p900, patient_id, visit_id, case_number, inspect_time, reprot_time, tumor_location, tumor_size, number_of_lesions, lesion_morphology, cutting_edge_distance, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv1}, #{uniqueIdLv2}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{caseNumber}, #{inspectTime}, #{reprotTime}, #{tumorLocation}, #{tumorSize}, #{numberOfLesions}, #{lesionMorphology}, #{cuttingEdgeDistance}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update pathological_eye set unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv1 = #{uniqueIdLv1}, unique_id_lv2 = #{uniqueIdLv2}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, case_number = #{caseNumber}, inspect_time = #{inspectTime}, reprot_time = #{reprotTime}, tumor_location = #{tumorLocation}, tumor_size = #{tumorSize}, number_of_lesions = #{numberOfLesions}, lesion_morphology = #{lesionMorphology}, cutting_edge_distance = #{cuttingEdgeDistance}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
